channel.title: üè¢ Korea University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Korea University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Constant Acceleration Flow
item.description: Constant Acceleration Flow (CAF) drastically accelerates image generation in diffusion models by leveraging a constant acceleration equation, outperforming state-of-the-art methods in both speed and q…

item.title: Inversion-based Latent Bayesian Optimization
item.description: InvBO: Inversion-based Latent Bayesian Optimization solves the misalignment problem in LBO, boosting optimization accuracy and efficiency.

item.title: Just Add $100 More: Augmenting Pseudo-LiDAR Point Cloud for Resolving Class-imbalance Problem
item.description: Boost 3D object detection accuracy by augmenting pseudo-LiDAR point clouds!

item.title: LLaMo: Large Language Model-based Molecular Graph Assistant
item.description: LLaMo, a novel Large Language Model-based Molecular Graph Assistant, uses multi-level graph projection and instruction tuning to achieve superior performance on diverse molecular tasks.

item.title: ROIDICE: Offline Return on Investment Maximization for Efficient Decision Making
item.description: ROIDICE: A novel offline reinforcement learning algorithm maximizes Return on Investment (ROI) by formulating the problem as linear fractional programming, yielding superior return-cost trade-offs.

item.title: Toward Approaches to Scalability in 3D Human Pose Estimation
item.description: Boosting 3D human pose estimation: Biomechanical Pose Generator and Binary Depth Coordinates enhance accuracy and scalability.

item.title: Unified Domain Generalization and Adaptation for Multi-View 3D Object Detection
item.description: Unified Domain Generalization and Adaptation (UDGA) tackles 3D object detection’s domain adaptation challenges by leveraging multi-view overlap and label-efficient learning, achieving state-of-the-art…

item.title: Video Token Merging for Long Video Understanding
item.description: Researchers boost long-form video understanding efficiency by 6.89x and reduce memory usage by 84% using a novel learnable video token merging algorithm.
